message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55/45 is more reasonable.
Bob, my offer is now 55/45. It's the same split you asked for, but I need to factor in the inflation.
Considering the inflation is affecting you, I'll take a bit more. 58/42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm dropping my offer to 50/50.  Take it or leave it - any more rounds and the inflation will hurt us both.
